{"draw":0,"recordsTotal":11,"recordsFiltered":11,"data":[{"id":550,"type":"Friend/Family - My account was abused by a family member or friend","appellant":"76561198162771977 (A L F A)","alts":"","description":"[quote]I have been banned for 2779 days ago due to the current case. I promise it was a mistake and it will never happen again. I request you to forgive my apology, my mistake and lift my ban. Best wishes to you and your team.​[/quote] ","evidence":"","assignee_id":5,"state_id":1,"views":77,"locked":0,"creator_id":1225,"modificator_id":1225,"created_at":"16.10.2022 12:56:18","updated_at":"2023-04-27 04:11:21","state":"Pending","assignee":"

"},{"id":553,"type":"Hijacked - My account was abused by hijacker","appellant":"76561198027371249 (ya)","alts":"","description":"My account got hacked in 2015/2016, i got my account back 8 months later but i couldn't got my inventory back. now i'm buying a new inventory and tried to make some trades at cs.money but there was saying that i got a bad steamrep. i just noticed now that i was reported for scamming or something like this and probably was the guy who hacked my account. i just want to trade again :(","evidence":"","assignee_id":5,"state_id":1,"views":57,"locked":0,"creator_id":1227,"modificator_id":1227,"created_at":"26.11.2022 23:59:41","updated_at":"2023-04-27 04:13:00","state":"Pending","assignee":"
Enstage
","last_reply":"
Enstage
"},{"id":556,"type":"Other / another reason ","appellant":"76561198112141725 (Evi)","alts":"","description":"Hello,  I have a tag on steamrep for more than 7 years already. Since this time i quit playing csgo and i only started to play again like 2 days ago, i really enjoy the game as i enjoyed it back in the days as a game and not as a trading system. Back in the days i used to discover skins as a young boy and really liked them, i was quite sure that i could use my brother's paypal account to pay skins but not only i didnt know a lot about skins, but i didnt a lot about paypal either...  I was doing it wrong and obviously i wasnt understanding / realizing what i was doing. Today, i want to appeal the caution since i didnt scam anyone, i didnt get any skins, didnt paid for any.   Now that i'm back to csgo, i kind of re enjoy the game and i can see that my caution tag is affecting my trading, i dont want to trade that much, im not that much into skins anymore, i just want to enjoy the gameplay of the game and be more free when im trying to trade with some people. I would really appreciate if my appeal could help take off the caution tag and let me restart my experience from 0 as an adult since i was really clueless about how to figure out trading at that time.  Thanks a lot, have a nice day. ","evidence":"","assignee_id":null,"state_id":1,"views":34,"locked":0,"creator_id":1234,"modificator_id":1234,"created_at":"19.03.2023 17:33:44","updated_at":"2023-03-19 17:33:44","state":"Pending","assignee":"
Unassigned
","last_reply":"
Never
"},{"id":557,"type":"Wrong Alt - Alternate account is not my account","appellant":"76561198071622727 (Chopperdog)","alts":"","description":"I have one alternate account that has not been fully set up because I used it so long ago when I was just messing around on CSGO the username is 1602Roxy, I do not remember the password to this account and do not use it ever. I am not the alternate account of Lieutenant Jackoff, Jackoff, or any of those accounts. I will say though that those are my friends accounts. I had no idea he scammed someone for Tf2 skins. I dont even talk to the guy anymore. I personally have never scammed anyone ever, I think it is a terrible thing to do to people. People like me put their hard earned money in to the market or even cases to try to get a chance at getting a rare skin. I am not sure what evidence I can provide to show that I am not his alternate account but I am willing to provide whatever evidence you deem fit. Please get back to me as soon as possible to get this corrected.","evidence":"","assignee_id":null,"state_id":1,"views":27,"locked":0,"creator_id":1235,"modificator_id":1235,"created_at":"21.03.2023 02:20:39","updated_at":"2023-03-21 02:20:39","state":"Pending","assignee":"
Unassigned
","last_reply":"
Never
"},{"id":559,"type":"Change of Heart","appellant":"76561198236828858 (Tyrone)","alts":"","description":"It happened 2320 days ago. Times have changed. I was reported for: Impersonation with intent to scam See link: https://f-o-g.trade/reports/490 Take a look yourself.  Please pardon me for my behaviour. I did not intend to hurt anyone. ","evidence":"","assignee_id":null,"state_id":1,"views":83,"locked":0,"creator_id":1237,"modificator_id":1237,"created_at":"06.04.2023 09:55:48","updated_at":"2023-04-06 09:55:48","state":"Pending","assignee":"
Unassigned
","last_reply":"
Never
"},{"id":560,"type":"Change of Heart","appellant":"76561198076569434 (Cologear)","alts":"","description":"So I have already submitted an appeal a little bit ago (Which is here: https://f-o-g.trade/appeals/344), it's been around 8 years since I got banned, and couple years ago I quit trading completely. The reason the appeal was denied was because I completely forgot about it. I uploaded it, had that tab open for a week, and then thought it was a lost cause because nobody responded. It turns out that somebody did reply to my appeal, but it was almost a month after I posted it. This time I will keep the tab open for a little bit longer. The reason I am appealing now is because one of the tools that traders use is FloatDB, and in order to use it to it's fullest you need a non steam rep banned account.","evidence":"","assignee_id":null,"state_id":1,"views":83,"locked":0,"creator_id":750,"modificator_id":750,"created_at":"08.04.2023 03:25:15","updated_at":"2023-04-08 03:25:15","state":"Pending","assignee":"
Unassigned
","last_reply":"
Never
"},{"id":563,"type":"Mistake - Admin misunderstood evidence or made a mistake","appellant":"76561198075639000 (px2)","alts":"| steamname: The Menace | steam3ID: [U:1:221703421] | steamID32: STEAM_0:1:110851710 | steamID64: https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198181969149 | customURL: https://steamcommunity.com/id/ShiFTheSecond | steamrep: https://steamrep.com/profiles/76561198181969149| steamname: The Menace | steam3ID: [U:1:221703421] | steamID32: STEAM_0:1:110851710 | steamID64: http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198181969149 | customURL: http://steamcommunity.com/id/ShiFTheSecond/ | steamrep: http://steamrep.com/profiles/76561198181969149 ","description":"So I just came back to playing CS:GO after 5 years for the launch of CS2 and went to login to csgofloat and was greeted with an error that I was banned on steamrep. I'm not sure what I have done to be banned on here so is there any way I can have this reversed so I can use csgofloat?","evidence":"","assignee_id":null,"state_id":1,"views":24,"locked":0,"creator_id":1241,"modificator_id":1241,"created_at":"12.05.2023 16:44:14","updated_at":"2023-05-12 16:44:14","state":"Pending","assignee":"

"},{"id":564,"type":"Change of Heart","appellant":"76561198121248137 (Cunhole)","alts":"| steamname: Samboo | steam3ID: [U:1:53444449] | steamID32: STEAM_0:1:26722224 | steamID64: http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198013710177 | customURL: http://steamcommunity.com/id/Elmz/ | steamrep: http://steamrep.com/profiles/76561198013710177 ","description":"Was a long time ago, kids do stupid things. i literally only want it appealed so i can use csgofloat to check my float ranks. if not its all good i understand not disregarding my actions.","evidence":"","assignee_id":null,"state_id":1,"views":25,"locked":0,"creator_id":1242,"modificator_id":1242,"created_at":"26.05.2023 11:05:18","updated_at":"2023-05-26 11:05:18","state":"Pending","assignee":"

"},{"id":566,"type":"Change of Heart","appellant":"76561198156185265 (vorduus)","alts":"| steamname: иншаллы | steam3ID: [U:1:326542341] | steamID32: STEAM_0:1:163271170 | steamID64: http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198286808069 | customURL: http://steamcommunity.com/id/Vorduus/ | steamrep: http://steamrep.com/profiles/76561198286808069","description":"https://forums.f-o-g.eu/threads/76561198156185265-vorduus.11868/ I got banned around 7 years ago, on the 18/04/2016, and it was silly from me. I do remember impersonating someone, little 11 year old me trying to get my hands on some random persons skins. I was a kid, under the impression that it could actually work. I can look on myself and I can say that I regret my actions, because some people have avoided me during trading or have refused access to a trading site because of my ban. I hope you can respond quickly, and have a nice day! :)","evidence":"","assignee_id":null,"state_id":1,"views":14,"locked":0,"creator_id":1244,"modificator_id":1244,"created_at":"11.06.2023 02:21:45","updated_at":"2023-06-11 02:21:45","state":"Pending","assignee":"
